name: databox-store-sqlite3
description: A simple Databox store with an SQLite3 backend for testing

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-store-sqlite3 . && docker tag databox-store-sqlite3 amar.io:5000/databox-store-sqlite3 && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-store-sqlite3

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
